      • tick

        public void tick()
        Description copied from class: Moving
        Handle the logic of the moving object
        Specified by:
        tick in class Moving

      • collide

        public boolean collide(Ghost g)
        Check if the player collided against the ghost. If yes, checks if the ghost is Frightened. If it is, then the ghost is killed, else the player dies, and restarts from the starting position, moving left.
        Parameters:
        g, - the ghost
        Returns:
        if a collision occurred

      • die

        public void die()
        If the ghost is not frightened, decrease the number of lives by 1. Reset the starting position of the player as well. If the ghosts are killed, reset them as well. If the player has 0 lives remaining, then set the GameOver field in GameMap to true.

      • checkCurrentPosition

        public void checkCurrentPosition()
        Checks current position of the player, to see if it is on a fruit or super fruit, which has not been eaten yet.

      • getLives

        public int getLives()
        Returns:
        the number of lives the player has.
